~ [[Things]] 

# CoCountant

**Type**: Bookkeeping Service  
**Website**: https://cocountant.com/  
**Status**: Active Client  

## Service Details

- **Controller-led bookkeeping and accounting** for startups and growing businesses
- **Flat monthly subscription** - no hourly billing
- **Dedicated controller** with 2-4 hour response time
- **Audit-ready books** with GAAP compliance
- **QuickBooks certified** at Elite level

## Current Status

- **Requesting**: Financial statements for July and August 2025
- **Action Needed**: Provide requested financial documentation
- **Priority**: High - needed for business operations

## Key Features

- Error-proof books with controller oversight
- Fast close guarantee (10-15 days)
- Expert support on speed dial
- Works inside existing tools (QuickBooks, Stripe)
- Your data stays with you
